DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to assess the interest of 3D Phase Sensitive Inversion Recuperation (PSIR)sequence in the MRI detection of spinal cord lesion. It will compare the sensitivity of this MRI sequence compared to the T1 and T2 sequences recommended in the assessment of neuraxis inflammatory diseases.
DOC.brief_title: 3D Phase Sensitive Inversion Recuperation MRI to Detect and Characterize Multiple Sclerosis Spinal Cord Lesions
